pages.title: Alignment: Light
pages.text: <thing>Light/$ (white) will create <item>$(l:essentials:beam/permeable)light clusters/$ when it hits blocks. It also can convert (cobble)stone into glowstone.$(br2)
<thing>Void-Light/$ AKA <thing>Darkness/$ will break light sources within range- where the radius is sqrt(<thing>power/$) / 2 blocks (maximum 4 blocks).$(br2)
